channel.title: Dragon boots not there
channel.description: does anyone have the dragon boots models because the client I'm using has the boots glitched or something so.. yea.. if anyone has them .dat

item.title: Dragon boots not there
item.dc:creator: @smeego smeego
item.description:
@smeego wrote:

Change the male/female wear model to the appropriate ID number that you are using “the model ID”

if(i == 2904) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = ####; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = ####; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = ####; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Dragon boot"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "These will protect my feet.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
I hope this helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon boots not there
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

[quote=“kingman002, post:5, topic:432091”]If you replace the water model then your water will be dragon boots /troll

Lots of releases of dragon boots, just google search it, or download an item dump[/quote]
i tried google really… didn’t find anything and i did the item dump part and i got the inv. model and the drop models were all correct but the wear models wern’t…

@r0m3r0 wrote:

killerkody:

It might have them. You should try to look in like itemdef. or some files. It might have been added under a different code.

if you do could you upload? and if i am wearing the water model how would i fix it?
